messages.author: Azer Sadykhzadeh

text.text:
Unigram received support for Telegram 8.0.1 features

Unigram 8.0

text: received support for "Who Read My Message In a Group Chat" and "Theme Changing In Personal Messages" features. They are available in the Direct version of the client.

messages.author: Azer Sadykhzadeh
text:
The Russian court fined Telegram another $120,000. This is caused by the refusal to remove illegal content, which is subject to restriction in accordance with the law. 

Thus, the amount of fines imposed by Telegram in Russia for refusing to remove prohibited content amounted to $480,000.

messages.author: Sominemo
text: Recently

users started to ask if it's dangerous to press anything on the number confirmation banner.

Starting from the

, Telegram gained an option to regularly check your linked phone number and second-factor password.

After pressing "Yes", the banner will simply go, the "No" button will propose you to link your new phone number to the account.

messages.author: Azer Sadykhzadeh

text.text: The reason for blocking the "Smart Voting" bot

text:
Several sources close to Telegram reported that the reason for blocking the "Smart Voting" bot was the refusal of app stores to release the latest update of the messenger on their platforms.

Pavel Durov
that this decision was influenced by Apple and Google whose policies are increasingly covering the Russian Federation and which are forced to obey the requirements of the country's authorities.

messages.author: Azer Sadykhzadeh

text.text: Why was it crucial to publish the September Telegram update as soon as possible

text:
The most important thing in this update is hidden under the hood. Earlier, Telegram used the "int32" value storage system (it has been since the launch of the application in 2013), where the range of user IDs, bots, groups and channels is already ending. In this regard, new users would simply lose the opportunity to register in the messenger, and the old ones would lose the opportunity to create groups, channels and bots.

Starting

, a fundamental restructuring of all storage systems and scripts to "int64" has been done, providing for the expansion of this range. That is why the developers wanted to update Telegram as soon as possible, thus minimizing the risks.

messages.author: Azer Sadykhzadeh

text.text:
Telegram Desktop has been updated to version 3.1.0

What's new:

text:
‚Äî Some animated emoji now have extra effects.
‚Äî Send üéÜ, üëç, üéâ, üí©, üéà and ‚ù§Ô∏è to any private chat, then click on the animated emoji to launch the effect.
‚Äî If your chat partner also has the chat open, you will both see effects.
‚Äî See the "Watching" status when your chat partner is enjoying emoji effects with you.
‚Äî More interactive emoji coming soon.
‚Äî Right click one of your outgoing messages in small groups to see who recently viewed it.
‚Äî To protect privacy, read receipts are only stored for 7 days after the message was sent.
‚Äî Record video and audio from live broadcasts in your group or channel.
‚Äî Admins can start recording from the '...' menu.
‚Äî Choose between recording in portrait or landscape orientation.
‚Äî Finished recordings are sent to the admin's Saved Messages and can be easily shared.
‚Äî Fix a crash when joining video chat or live broadcast.
‚Äî Add a "Close to Taskbar" option when tray icon is disabled (Windows and Linux).

messages.author: Azer Sadykhzadeh

text.text: Pavel Durov commented the reason for blocking the Smart Voting bot

text: On his official
, Pavel posted an article about why Telegram had to follow the Apple and Google policies when they suspended a voting app.

text.text: "Telegram gives its users more freedom than any other app. If Telegram has to temporarily remove some content due to a law, it means that other platforms would have removed it long before us."

text: , ‚Äî Pavel Durov wrote in his post.
